subject: Hockey, Ice
Concussions
lead_paragraph: Bruins  center Marc Savard said the hit to the head he took from Pittsburgh’s Matt Cooke was dirty and that he is still feeling the effects of the concussion that likely ended his season.
snippet: Bruins  center Marc Savard said the hit to the head he took from Pittsburgh’s Matt Cooke was dirty and that he is still feeling the effects of the concussion that likely ended his season.
